package.name: Kai
package.shortDescription: Battery level of Bluetooth devices on the lock screen.

descriptionlist.description: Kai provides information about the battery level of paired Bluetooth devices in the form of widgets. Just by looking at the lock screen, you can get information about the charge level of your AppleWatch, AirPods and AirPods Case. Kai works with many lock screen customization tweaks: Kalm, Grupi, Axon, Quart, Complications, Watermelon, Veza, QuickLS, Jellyfish among them. Kai's advanced settings allow you to customize your widgets.
